Fastify

Fast and low overhead web framework, for Node.js

https://www.fastify.io

Installation

Create a new project folder and install Fastify with npm:

npm install fastify

Quick Start

Create a server.js file and add the following content:

const fastify = require('fastify')({ logger: true })

fastify.get('/', async (request, reply) => {
  return { hello: 'world' }
})

const start = async () => {
  try {
    await fastify.listen({ port: 3000 })
  } catch (err) {
    fastify.log.error(err)
    process.exit(1)
  }
}
start()

Features

  • Highly performant: as far as we know, Fastify is one of the fastest web frameworks in town.
  • Extensible: Fastify is fully extensible via its hooks, plugins and decorators.
  • Schema based: it is recommended to use JSON Schema to validate your routes and serialize your outputs.
  • Logging: logs are extremely important but are costly; we chose the best logger to almost remove this cost, Pino!
  • Developer friendly: the framework is built to be very expressive and to help developers in their daily use.
  • TypeScript ready: we work hard to maintain a TypeScript type declaration file.

Machine: EX41S-SSD, Intel Core i7, 4Ghz, 64GB RAM, 4C/8T, SSD.
